messages.content:
can you modify this to make it a better upwork contractor post:
Help @Nur.Coop start selling wholesale and retail, you can see our work here: http://etsy.com/shop/nurcoop

We need someone to help us create a tool to help convince shops to hold our products on their shelves. I will go into the shop and I want to leave behind some documentation along with a business card. We can produce these two pages:
1) which is a catalog of our products (1 page with designs and layout done as a indesign or .ai file.
2) A table with an explanation on the top of wholesale/retail with a list of products where they can mark how much they want of each, should be a google sheet/excel file) and a total on the bottom.

Video of our shop and the idea: https://www.loom.com/share/1cc8fefbdd0d47a2a48c3625ea2e12dd

Resources available: https://www.loom.com/share/59d488899c3e47c19a3b2470db6f4d05?from_recorder=1&focus_title=1

Let me know if this makes sense and if you'd like to help make this happen :) 

I've attached some design elements so you can get an understanding of our aesthetic, best to see it on our site here:
http://etsy.com/shop/nurcoop


Review for clarity and find 5 cons and 5 pros and them make a new improved version with the pros and cons addressed

Review:

**Pros:**
1. Clear description of the project and what is needed.
2. Providing links to the Etsy shop and resources helps potential contractors understand the aesthetic and scope.
3. Including a video of the shop and idea adds visual context.
4. Clearly mentioning the desired deliverables - catalog and spreadsheet.
5. Invitation for potential contractors to express interest.

**Cons:**
1. The post lacks a professional tone, with informal language like "Help @Nur.Coop start selling wholesale and retail."
2. It could benefit from more detail on the target audience and market strategy.
3. The attachment of design elements may not provide enough context or guidance for potential contractors.
4. No mention of the budget or timeline for the project.
5. The call to action ("Let me know if this makes sense and if you'd like to help make this happen") could be stronger.

Improved version:

Title: Professional Contractor Needed to Develop Sales Support Tools for Nur.Coop

Description:
Nur.Coop is looking to expand its market reach both in wholesale and retail sectors. Our Etsy shop showcases our unique products, but we're ready to take the next step by convincing retail shops to feature our items. To facilitate this process, we need a skilled contractor to develop sales support tools that will leave a lasting impression on potential vendors.

Scope of Work:
- Create a visually appealing catalog showcasing our product range. This one-page document should be designed using Adobe InDesign or Illustrator to reflect our brand aesthetic. (Design elements can be viewed on our Etsy shop for reference.)
- Develop a customizable spreadsheet (Google Sheets or Excel) with clear explanations of wholesale and retail pricing structures. This spreadsheet should allow vendors to indicate their desired quantities for each product and calculate a total order amount.

Additional Resources:
To better understand our vision and aesthetic, please watch this brief video tour of our shop: [Insert Video Link]
For design inspiration and reference, visit our Etsy shop: [Insert Etsy Shop Link]
Attached design elements provide insight into our brand's visual identity.

Requirements:
- Demonstrated experience in graphic design and document creation.
- Strong proficiency in Adobe InDesign/Illustrator and Google Sheets/Excel.
- Ability to understand and reflect Nur.Coop's brand aesthetic.
- Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with our team.
- Proven track record of delivering high-quality work within specified timelines.

Budget and Timeline:
Budget and timeline are negotiable based on the scope of work and proposed deliverables. Please provide your estimated quote and project timeline when expressing interest in this opportunity.

How to Apply:
If you're excited about the prospect of helping Nur.Coop expand its market presence, please send us a message outlining your relevant experience and approach to this project. Feel free to ask any questions to clarify the scope or requirements.

Thank you for considering this opportunity to collaborate with Nur.Coop. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

what should the title be? 
Nur.Coop is create a catalog of it's etsy shop to take to retail stores. To facilitate this process, we need a skilled contractor to develop marketing material that will leave a lasting impression on potential vendors that we can leave at their shops. I'm thinking one catalog and one sheet for indicating orders.

Scope of Work:
Create a visually appealing catalog of our products with marketing copy explaining what NurCoop is and about the consigment/whole sale opportunity. This one-page(trifold? front/back?) document should be designed using Canva for the first version and then in Adobe InDesign or Illustrator to reflect our brand aesthetic. (Design elements can be viewed on our Etsy shop and attached here for reference.)
Edit the canva here: You can edit the canva : https://www.canva.com/design/DAGCGv14G8g/l4fCT1AUM76HM-GoXZXHlg/edit


Develop a customizable table/sheet (Google Sheets or Excel) with clear explanations of consignment and wholesale prices. This spreadsheet should allow vendors to indicate their desired quantities for each product and calculate a total order amount.

Additional Resources:
To better understand our vision and aesthetic, please watch this brief video tour of our etsy shop: https://www.loom.com/share/1cc8fefbdd0d47a2a48c3625ea2e12dd

About the writing style guide and copy: https://www.loom.com/share/3aa03f6fe6894657b3fe07eb760f9302?from_recorder=1&focus_title=1

Design resources available: https://www.loom.com/share/59d488899c3e47c19a3b2470db6f4d05?from_recorder=1&focus_title=1

For design inspiration and reference, visit our Etsy shop: [Insert Etsy Shop Link]
Attached design elements provide insight into our brand's visual identity.

Requirements:

Demonstrated experience in graphic design and document creation.
Strong proficiency in Adobe InDesign/Illustrator and Google Sheets/Excel.
Ability to understand and reflect Nur.Coop's ethical sourcing and regenerative approach and brand aesthetic.

Budget and Timeline:
Budget and timeline are negotiable based on the scope of work and proposed deliverables. Please provide your estimated quote and project timeline when expressing interest in this opportunity. I need something by tomorrow insha'allah, it doesn't have to be perfect it needs to be done since I leave London and there are many stores here I'd like to leave a brochure with :)

Insha'allah you can help make this happen, Eid Mubarak!

Title: Contractor Needed to Develop Marketing Material for Nur.Coop's Expansion into Retail Stores

Description:
Nur.Coop is embarking on a journey to extend its presence from Etsy to retail stores. To support this endeavor, we require the expertise of a skilled contractor to craft compelling marketing materials that will captivate potential vendors. Our goal is to leave behind impactful documents at their shops, facilitating engagement and showcasing the essence of Nur.Coop.

Scope of Work:
1. Design a visually captivating catalog of our products, accompanied by persuasive marketing copy that introduces Nur.Coop and outlines the consignment/wholesale opportunities. This one-page trifold document will initially be created using Canva and later refined in Adobe InDesign or Illustrator to align with our brand's aesthetic.
   - Edit the Canva design here: [Insert Canva Edit Link]
2. Develop a customizable table/sheet (Google Sheets or Excel) detailing consignment and wholesale prices. This spreadsheet should enable vendors to specify their desired quantities for each product and automatically calculate the total order amount.

Additional Resources:
To gain insight into our vision and aesthetic, please watch this brief video tour of our Etsy shop: [Insert Etsy Shop Video Link]
Refer to our writing style guide and copy preferences: [Insert Writing Style Guide Link]
Explore our design resources: [Insert Design Resources Link]
For design inspiration and reference, visit our Etsy shop: [Insert Etsy Shop Link]
Attached design elements offer further insight into our brand's visual identity.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in graphic design and document creation.
- Proficiency in Adobe InDesign/Illustrator and Google Sheets/Excel.
- Ability to comprehend and reflect Nur.Coop's ethos of ethical sourcing and regenerative practices, aligning with our brand aesthetic.

Budget and Timeline:
Budget and timeline are negotiable, considering the project scope and desired deliverables. Please provide your estimated quote and project timeline upon expressing interest. Urgency is paramount, as we aim to have the materials ready by tomorrow. While perfection is not imperative, timely completion is crucial, as I depart London shortly and wish to distribute brochures to numerous stores.

Insha'allah, your assistance in bringing this endeavor to fruition would be greatly appreciated. Eid Mubarak!

(Note: Adjustments made for clarity, professionalism, and inclusion of pertinent details. Removed informal language and strengthened the call to action.)
